Attribute.Name: OrderHeaderKey
Attribute.Description: This is the Order Header Key of the Order

Attribute.Name: MeetsNoHassleCriteria
Attribute.Description: This is the flag which says whether Price match meets the criteria or not

Attribute.Name: OrderLineKey
Attribute.Description: The OrderLineKey for the order line of the order for which the price match is being performed

Attribute.Name: PrimeLineNo
Attribute.Description: This is the Prime LineNo of the OrderLine for which price match is to be performed.

Attribute.Name: SubLineNo
Attribute.Description: This is the Sub Line No of the OrderLine for which price match is to be performed.
